outputs.output_descr:
Policy advisory, capacity development and technical assistance services to Country Offices and UN Country Teams to support renewed actions for MDG.
Knowledge products on MDG for different regional and country contexts.
Coordinated support for MDG.
Africa Adaptation Programme is assisting 21 countries across the African continent to incorporate climate change risks and opportunities into national development processes

project_descr: This project will help accelerate progress towards the achievement of the MDGs
project_title: COORDINATED SUPPORT TO ACHIEVE THE MDGs
